Plot: When 30-something Jesse returns to his alma mater for a professor's retirement party, he falls for Zibby, a college student, and is faced with a powerful attraction that springs up between them.
Title: Liberal Arts
Actors: Josh Radnor, Elizabeth Olsen, Richard Jenkins, Allison Janney
tomatoConsensus: While it's hard not to wish it had a little more bite, Liberal Arts ultimately succeeds as a good-natured -- and surprisingly clever -- look at the addictive pull of nostalgia for our youth.
